message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm sure you'll find our asking price of $1450000 quite reasonable.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am looking to stay closer to my budget. I can offer you $1000000 for it. Please let me know if we can work something out.

Hi Bob, I appreciated your consideration. To bridge the gap, I'm willing to lower my offer to $1300000. This price reflects the product's high quality and the benefit it will bring to you. I hope we can close the deal at this point.
